TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityRulesAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityRulesAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SecurityRulesAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示 Common Language Runtime 應針對組件強制執行的一組安全性規則。

span.span: Indicates the set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會指出 common language runtime 的組件時應強制執行安全性規則的設定。This class indicates which set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly. 例如，組件標示為`[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]`使用.NET Framework 2.0 透明度規則，其中公用的安全性關鍵類型和成員視為為安全性安全關鍵外部組件。For example, an assembly that is marked with `[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]` uses the .NET Framework version 2.0 transparency rules, where public security-critical types and members are treated as security-safe-critical outside the assembly. 這需要安全性關鍵類型和成員執行完全信任的連結要求，以外部呼叫端存取時，強制執行安全性關鍵的行為。This requires security-critical types and members to perform a link demand for full trust to enforce security-critical behavior when they are accessed by external callers. 一般而言，層級 1 規則應僅針對相容性，例如 2.0 版組件。Typically, level 1 rules should be used only for compatibility, such as for version 2.0 assemblies. 如需有關層級 1 行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about level 1 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 層級 2 行為的相關資訊，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about level 2 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.SecurityRuleSet ruleSet) cil managed

param.name: ruleSet
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定透明度規則集。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules set.

summary.span: 使用指定的規則集值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified rule set value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定`ruleSet`參數，使用.NET Framework 2.0 版的規則或如[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]規則。When you specify the `ruleSet` parameter, use for .NET Framework version 2.0 rules or for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] rules. 如需有關行為，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md)。For more information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-1.md). 如需有關資訊行為，請參閱[安全性透明程式碼，層級 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)。For information about behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RuleSet As SecurityRuleSet
public: property System::Security::SecurityRuleSet RuleSet { System::Security::SecurityRuleSet get(); };

span.span: Gets the rule set to be applied.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定要套用的透明度規則。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules to be applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SkipVerificationInFullTrust { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 判斷完全信任的透明程式碼是否應略過 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 驗證。

span.span: Determines whether fully trusted transparent code should skip Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) verification.

value.span: 如果應該略過 MSIL 驗證則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if MSIL verification should be skipped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該用於只最佳化，因為無法強制執行安全性保證透明程式碼，如果無法驗證的程式碼。This property should be used only for optimization, because security guarantees made for transparent code cannot be enforced if the code is unverifiable. 如果您使用這個屬性來略過組件的 MSIL 驗證時，使用`transparent`選項中以靜態方式驗證組件的透明程式碼符合類型安全需求。If you use this property to skip MSIL verification for an assembly, use the `transparent` option in the to statically verify that the assembly's transparent code meets type safety requirements.
